member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.Bluetooth
member.summary: Entry point to all Bluetooth LE functionality.
member.remarks: Several platforms require permissions for this functionality to work. See Permissions for more details

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.Bluetooth.GetAvailabilityAsync
member.summary: Returns true if Bluetooth is physically available and user has given the app permission.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.Bluetooth.RequestDeviceAsync(InTheHand.Bluetooth.RequestDeviceOptions)
member.summary: Performs a device lookup and prompts the user for permission if required.
member.returns: A BluetoothDevice or null if unsuccessful.

member.name: E:InTheHand.Bluetooth.Bluetooth.AvailabilityChanged
member.summary: Bluetooth availability has changed, for example by disabling the radio or revoking user permission.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothAdvertisingEvent
member.summary: Represents a received advertising packet.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothAdvertisingEvent.Device
member.summary: The device that sent the advertisement.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothAdvertisingEvent.Uuids
member.summary: List of UUIDs contained in the advertisement.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothAdvertisingEvent.Name
member.summary: Name sent with the advertisement.
member.remarks: Could be a shortened or complete name.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothAdvertisingEvent.Appearance
member.summary: Appearance data describing the type of device sending the advertisement.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothAdvertisingEvent.TxPower
member.summary: Transmit power.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothAdvertisingEvent.Rssi
member.summary: Received Signal Strength.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothAdvertisingEvent.ManufacturerData
member.summary: Manufacturer specific data in a dictionary with the manufacturer identifier as the key.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothAdvertisingEvent.ServiceData
member.summary: Service data relating to each service UUID.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice
member.summary: A BluetoothDevice instance represents a remote Bluetooth device

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier for the device.
member.remarks: On most platforms this will be the Bluetooth address, but some, such as iOS, will use a locally assigned unique id.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.Name
member.summary: The human-readable name of the device.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.Gatt
member.summary: Provides a way to interact with this device’s GATT server.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.IsPaired
member.summary: Returns true if the device is paired.
member.remarks: Supported on Windows and Android only.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.PairAsync
member.summary: Initiate pairing. (Work in progress)
member.remarks: Supported on Windows and Android only.

member.name: E:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.GattServerDisconnected
member.summary: Fired when an active GATT connection is lost.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.AddDisposableObject(System.Object,System.IDisposable)
member.summary: Adds a native (IDisposable) object to the dispose list
member.param: This is generally the managed object that contains the native object but it can be anything that can serve as a unique key.
The native object that we will disposed when the user requests a disconnect

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.DisposeAllNativeObjects
member.summary: Called in RemoteServer.PlatformCleanup to dispose all of the native object that have been collected.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.CreateNativeInstance
member.summary: Used to Recreate 'NativeDevice' if it is in a disposed state.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice.IsDisposedItem(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the native object for this container has been disposed.
member.param: This is generally the managed object that contains the native object but it can be anything that can serve as a unique key.
member.returns: True if the container exists and it's native object has been disposed.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothLEAppearance
member.summary: Represents the external appearance of a device.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothLEAppearanceCategory
member.summary: Represents the external appearance of a device.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothLEScanFilter
member.summary: Defines an individual filter to apply when requested devices.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothLEScanFilter.Services
member.summary: List of service UUIDs which a device must expose to match the filter.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothLEScanFilter.Name
member.summary: If present requires a device to exactly match the supplied name.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothLEScanFilter.NamePrefix
member.summary: If present requires a device name to start with the supplied prefix.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothPhy
member.summary: Bluetooth physical layer.

member.summary: LE 1M Physical Channel.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothPhy.Le2m
member.summary: LE 2M Physical Channel.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothPhy.LeCoded
member.summary: LE Coded Physical Channel.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUtiAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to attach a Uniform Type Identifier to a Bluetooth UUID.
member.remarks: Usage on a class indicates a namespace such as org.bluetooth.characteristic and on a field represents the individual name.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUtiAttribute.Uti
member.summary: Uniform Type Identifier e.g. 'org.bluetooth.service.generic_access'.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid
member.summary: Represents a Bluetooth UUID. Can be expressed as a Guid or a short ID for documented Bluetooth SIG definitions.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.op_Equality(InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid,InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid)
member.summary: Returns true if both Uuids are equal.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.op_Equality(InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns true if both Uuids are equal.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.op_Inequality(InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid,InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid)
member.summary: Returns true if both Uuids are unequal.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.op_Inequality(InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns true if both Uuids are unequal.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.Value
member.summary: The full underlying value as a .

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.ToString
member.summary: Returns the UUID as a string using the short id if possible.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.Empty
member.summary: A default Uuid containing a zero Guid.
member.value: This is not a valid value so be careful passing this to any native function.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.FromShortId(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Returns the bluetooth device UUID from a short ID.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.TryGetShortId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Attempts to get the short Bluetooth ID from a UUID.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid.FromId(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the Uuid for a given Bluetooth SIG name. Names must beging with the "org.bluetooth" prefix.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.ClientCharacteristicDescriptorValue
member.summary: Indicates the state of the Client Characteristic Configuration descriptor.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.ClientCharacteristicDescriptorValue.None
member.summary: Neither notification nor indications are enabled.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.ClientCharacteristicDescriptorValue.Notify
member.summary: Characteristic notifications are enabled.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.ClientCharacteristicDescriptorValue.Indicate
member.summary: Characteristic indications are enabled.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic
member.summary: Represents a GATT Characteristic, which is a basic data element that provides further information about a peripheral’s service.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.Service
member.summary: The GATT service this characteristic belongs to.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.Uuid
member.summary: The UUID of the characteristic.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.Properties
member.summary: The properties of this characteristic.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.Value
member.summary: The currently cached characteristic value. This value gets updated when the value of the characteristic is read or updated via a notification or indication.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.ReadValueAsync
member.summary: Performs a Characteristic Value read from the Bluetooth LE device.
member.returns: The object required to manage the asynchronous operation, which, upon completion, returns the data read from the device.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.WriteValueWithResponseAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Performs a Characteristic Value write to the Bluetooth LE device.
member.param: The data to be written to the Bluetooth LE device.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.WriteValueWithoutResponseAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Performs a Characteristic Value write to the Bluetooth LE device.
member.param: The data to be written to the Bluetooth LE device.

member.name: E:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.CharacteristicValueChanged
member.summary: Fired when the value changes, as a result of a value change notification/indication.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.StartNotificationsAsync
member.summary: Registers to start receiving value changed notifications.
member.exception: Characteristic must support either Notify or Indicate properties.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.StopNotificationsAsync
member.summary: Unregisters for value changed notifications.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristic.UserDescription
member.summary: Get the user friendly description for this GattCharacteristic, if the User Description Descriptor is present, otherwise this will be an empty string.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties
member.summary: Specifies the values for the GATT characteristic properties as well as the GATT Extended Characteristic Properties Descriptor.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.None
member.summary: The characteristic doesn’t have any properties that apply.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Broadcast
member.summary: The characteristic supports broadcasting

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Read
member.summary: The characteristic is readable

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.WriteWithoutResponse
member.summary: The characteristic supports Write Without Response

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Write
member.summary: The characteristic is writable

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Notify
member.summary: The characteristic is notifiable

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.Indicate
member.summary: The characteristic is indicatable

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.AuthenticatedSignedWrites
member.summary: The characteristic supports signed writes

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.ExtendedProperties
member.summary: The ExtendedProperties Descriptor is present

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.ReliableWrites
member.summary: The characteristic supports reliable writes

member.name: F:InTheHand.Bluetooth.GattCharacteristicProperties.WriteableAuxiliaries
member.summary: The characteristic has writable auxiliaries

member.summary: Permit to manage autoconnect in GattServer

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.Device
member.summary: Gets the parent remote device.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if there is an active connection with the remote GATT server.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.Mtu
member.summary: Gets the maximum transmission unit (MTU) size.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.ConnectAsync
member.summary: Open a connection to the remote GATT server.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects the remote GATT server.
member.remarks: Some platforms do not have an explicit Disconnect and will keep the connection open until there are no references to associated services and characteristics.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.GetPrimaryServiceAsync(InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid)
member.summary: Returns the primary service matching the specified UUID.
member.param: The requested service or null if not present.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.GetPrimaryServicesAsync(System.Nullable{InTheHand.Bluetooth.BluetoothUuid})
member.summary: Returns primary services, optionally filtering to the supplied UUID.
member.returns: A list of matching primary services.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.ReadRssi
member.summary: Requests the Received Signal Strength Indication (RSSI) from the remote device.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.PreferredPhy
member.summary: Sets the preferred Physical Layer (PHY) if supported.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RemoteGattServer.RequestMtuAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Request the maximum transmission unit (MTU) size.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RequestDeviceOptions
member.summary: Specifies options to use when requesting access to a device.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RequestDeviceOptions.Filters
member.summary: Filters which define the services or attributes the remote device must support.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RequestDeviceOptions.OptionalServices
member.summary: Additional services which are not required but the client will have access to.
member.remarks: Not used as unlike the web we do not restrict which services are accessible.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Bluetooth.RequestDeviceOptions.AcceptAllDevices
member.summary: If set the request returns all available devices with no filters applied.
